errors.error_description: Specified Python 2.7 as a requirement when modern projects like columnflow require Python 3.x
correction_candidates: Change Python 2.7 to Python 3.8 or higher
Remove the Python version requirement entirely
Change to Python 3.6+ for broader compatibility
Specify Python 3.9+ as the minimum requirement
errors.golden_answer: Change Python 2.7 to Python 3.8 or higher
